page.title: 17MINERAL WATER WELL
page.content: { In Guilthwaite a mineral water spa has been found. It was discovered in 1664 by George Westby of Guilthwaite who had studied Physics.He built a small house over the well and made a large bath for several people to go in at once. He was supported by Dr.Yarburgh of Newark who sent many of his patients to take the cure.Gradually the house was allowed to decay after the death of Westby.The spa can still be found and is marked on the map at Spa House farm.The water is said to be a cure for Vomitings,Belchings,Cholera, Flatulences,Hypo-Indegestion, Stone obstructed catamenia,Green Sickness, Heat and stoppage of water,habitual Cholicks, Obesity,heart burn and nidrous belchings.
